LanguageData.BattIePatch_SilenceIsGolden_TopWarning: Changing these options will require restarting the game to apply.
LanguageData.BattIePatch_SilenceIsGolden_BottomWarnin: Don't see the options you chose? Restart your game!
LanguageData.BattIePatch_SilenceIsGolden_Lable1: The following choices allow you to customize which threats a psychically deaf pawn should be immune to:\n(Will not fix already affected pawns)
LanguageData.BattIePatch_SilenceIsGolden_GoldenCubeIm: Psychically deaf pawns will be immune to the fascination the Golden Cube stirs in others.
LanguageData.BattIePatch_SilenceIsGolden_UnnaturalCor: Psychically deaf pawns will never be targeted or followed by an unnatural corpse.
LanguageData.BattIePatch_SilenceIsGolden_RevenantHypn: Revenants will not try to target psychically deaf pawns.
Revenants will try to target psychically deaf pawns, but their hypnosis will have no effect.
LanguageData.BattIePatch_SilenceIsGolden_Lable2: This choice will affect the random pawn selection, making it weighed more towards selective pawns with high Psychic Sensitivity
LanguageData.BattIePatch_WeightedModeDesc: Entities beings will seek out pawns based on Psychic Sensitivity, meaning highly sensitive pawns will be affected more often and low sensitivity pawns less often. This will generally make the game slightly harder, as more bad things will be centered on fewer pawns.\n\nAt the moment, this only affects Revenants hunting your pawns. More will be added later.
